And they <S%H1869>bend<s%> their <S%H3956>tongues<s%> like their <S%H7198>bow<s%> for <S%H8267>lies<s%>: but they are not <S%H1396>valiant<s%> for the <S%H530>truth<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>; for they <S%H3318>proceed<s%> from <S%H7451>evil<s%> to <S%H7451>evil<s%>, and they <S%H3045>know<s%> not me, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And they will <S%H2048>deceive<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbour<s%>, and will not <S%H1696>speak<s%> the <S%H571>truth<s%>: they have <S%H3925>taught<s%> their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H8267>lies<s%>, and <S%H3811>weary<s%> themselves to commit <S%H5753>iniquity<s%>. deceive: or, mock

Thine <S%H3427>habitation<s%> is in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H4820>deceit<s%>; through <S%H4820>deceit<s%> they <S%H3985>refuse<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> me, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, Behold, I will <S%H6884>melt<s%> them, and <S%H974>try<s%> them; for how shall I <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6440>for<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>?

Their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is as an <S%H2671>arrow<s%> shot <S%H7819>out<s%>; it <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> <S%H4820>deceit<s%>: one <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> <S%H7965>peaceably<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbour<s%> with his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, but in <S%H7130>heart<s%> he <S%H7760>layeth<s%> his <S%H696>wait<s%>. in heart: Heb. in the midst of him his wait: or, wait for him
Shall I not <S%H6485>visit<s%> them for these things? <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: shall not my <S%H5315>soul<s%> be <S%H5358>avenged<s%> on such a <S%H1471>nation<s%> as this?

And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H1530>heaps<s%>, and a <S%H4583>den<s%> of <S%H8577>dragons<s%>; and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H8077>desolate<s%>, without an <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%>. desolate: Heb. desolation

Who is the <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, that may <S%H995>understand<s%> this? and who is he to whom the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%>, that he may <S%H5046>declare<s%> it, for what the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6>perisheth<s%> and is burned <S%H3341>up<s%> like a <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, that none passeth <S%H5674>through<s%>?

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%>, Because they have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> my <S%H8451>law<s%> which I <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them, and have not <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%>, neither <S%H1980>walked<s%> therein;

But have <S%H3212>walked<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H8307>imagination<s%> of their own <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1168>Baalim<s%>, which their <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H3925>taught<s%> them: imagination: or, stubbornness

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; Behold, I will <S%H398>feed<s%> them, even this <S%H5971>people<s%>, with <S%H3939>wormwood<s%>, and give them <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H7219>gall<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%>.

I will <S%H6327>scatter<s%> them also among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, whom neither they nor their <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H3045>known<s%>: and I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them, till I have <S%H3615>consumed<s%> them.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, <S%H995>Consider<s%> ye, and <S%H7121>call<s%> for the mourning <S%H6969>women<s%>, that they may <S%H935>come<s%>; and <S%H7971>send<s%> for <S%H2450>cunning<s%> women, that they may <S%H935>come<s%>:

And let them make <S%H4116>haste<s%>, and take <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H5092>wailing<s%> for us, that our <S%H5869>eyes<s%> may run <S%H3381>down<s%> with <S%H1832>tears<s%>, and our <S%H6079>eyelids<s%> gush <S%H5140>out<s%> with <S%H4325>waters<s%>.

For a <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H5092>wailing<s%> is <S%H8085>heard<s%> out of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, How are we <S%H7703>spoiled<s%>! we are <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H954>confounded<s%>, because we have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, because our <S%H4908>dwellings<s%> have cast us <S%H7993>out<s%>.

Yet <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, O ye <S%H802>women<s%>, and let your <S%H241>ear<s%> <S%H3947>receive<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and <S%H3925>teach<s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> <S%H5092>wailing<s%>, and every <S%H802>one<s%> her <S%H7468>neighbour<s%> <S%H7015>lamentation<s%>.

For <S%H4194>death<s%> is come <S%H5927>up<s%> into our <S%H2474>windows<s%>, and is <S%H935>entered<s%> into our <S%H759>palaces<s%>, to cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H5768>children<s%> from <S%H2351>without<s%>, and the young <S%H970>men<s%> from the <S%H7339>streets<s%>.

<S%H1696>Speak<s%>, Thus <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, Even the <S%H5038>carcases<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> as <S%H1828>dung<s%> upon the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field<s%>, and as the <S%H5995>handful<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H7114>harvestman<s%>, and none shall <S%H622>gather<s%> them.

But let him that <S%H1984>glorieth<s%> <S%H1984>glory<s%> in this, that he <S%H7919>understandeth<s%> and <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> me, that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> which <S%H6213>exercise<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>, <S%H4941>judgment<s%>, and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, in the <S%H776>earth<s%>: for in these things I <S%H2654>delight<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
